long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Amazon Product Analyzing Suite – Your Ultimate Tool for Comprehensive Product Research

The Amazon Product Analyzing Suite is a powerful, all-in-one solution for Amazon sellers who want to streamline their workflows, gain deeper insights into products, and make data-driven decisions. With a robust set of tools designed to empower sellers, this suite simplifies product research, supplier discovery, price tracking, review analysis, keyword research, and revenue estimation.

🔑 Key Features and Benefits

Amazon Price Tracking:
✅ Track product prices on Amazon in real-time with full manual control.
✅ Access estimated Last Month Sales (LMS) and Last Month Revenue (LMR) for any product based on price and estimated sales.
✅ Monitor prices directly on product pages and category overview pages.

Historical Data Tracking:
✅ Keep a record of key metrics like price, LMS, and LMR over time.
✅ Automatically generate a timestamped history of changes, enabling you to track trends and respond to market shifts faster.

Review Analysis Tool:
✅ Extract all customer reviews for any Amazon product automatically.
✅ Filter reviews by keywords, star ratings (1–5), or both to focus on what matters most.
✅ Copy or download individual reviews or the entire dataset for in-depth analysis.
Reset filters anytime to view all reviews again.

Automated Supplier Research (based on Images):
✅ Use image-based Alibaba supplier lookup to identify potential manufacturers for Amazon products.
✅ Save supplier results directly to your dashboard, complete with product links and contact information.

Keyword Research and Demand Analysis:
✅ Extract Amazon-suggested keywords for any seed keyword.
✅ Perform Google Trends analysis on keywords to evaluate their popularity and demand over time.
✅ Copy or download keyword lists, complete with trends data, to refine your SEO and product listing strategies.

Comprehensive Personal Dashboard:

Organize all your tracked data in one place, with the following details stored for every product:

✅ Product image and ASIN.
✅ Amazon product URL and Alibaba supplier URL (if available).
✅ Current price, LMS, and LMR.
✅ Custom notes for each product to keep your research organized.
✅ Auto-check functionality to analyze products over time and track historical trends. The extension automatically gathers the current price and estimated last month revenue for you.
✅ Export all tracked data, including reviews, keywords, prices, LMS, LMR, and supplier details, to a CSV file.
✅ Easily integrate with other tools or perform advanced offline analysis.
✅ Custom Currency Setting: Set your preferred currency symbol, which is applied across all tracked data in the dashboard for easier reference. Default values are displayed without currency until one is set.

🌟 Who Is This Extension For?

This suite is ideal for Amazon sellers who want to:
1️⃣ Stay Competitive: Gain insights into pricing and competitor strategies.
2️⃣ Discover Suppliers: Streamline sourcing by identifying Alibaba manufacturers effortlessly.
3️⃣ Analyze Products Effectively: Understand customer feedback, price trends, and market demand.
4️⃣ Save Time: Automate repetitive tasks like data collection and review analysis.

Why Choose the Amazon Product Analyzing Suite?

👉 All-in-One Solution: Combines supplier research, price tracking, keyword research, and review analysis in one tool.
👉 Data-Driven Decisions: Empowers you with actionable insights to make smarter, faster decisions.
👉 Time-Saving Automation: Reduces manual work with automated data extraction and organization.
👉 Customizable Workflow: Features like custom currencies and notes adapt to your business needs.
_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Disclaimer:
This extension is developed independently and is not affiliated with Amazon or Alibaba. While we strive for accuracy, data is based on publicly available information and may occasionally contain errors. Please use the data as a guideline and verify critical information independently.

To use this extension and access all its features, a license key is required. Every license key comes with a 7-day free trial, during which you will not be charged. You can cancel anytime within the trial period to avoid any charges.
